hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #4# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bomb Bag#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Boomerang# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Forest Temple Compass#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Forest Temple Compass#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #6# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Market## has #8# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #grave with a free chest#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Map of the Water Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
